aspecttable.name: B&O 1980
aspecttable.reference: As described in the Chessie System 1980 Rule Book.

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at not exceeding limited speed.
aspect.comment: Signal is identical to Approach Medium except for the addition of a triangle flag on signal mast

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at not exceeding medium speed.

aspect.name: Limited Clear
aspect.indication: Limited speed through crossovers, turnouts, sidings, interlocking limits and over power switches: then proceed at maximum authorized speed.
aspect.comment: Signal is identical to Medium Clear except for the addition of a triangle flag on signal mast

aspect.name: Medium Clear
aspect.indication: Medium speed through crossovers, turnouts, sidings, interlocking limits and over power switches: then proceed at maximum authorized speed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed at not exceeding medium speed approaching next signal at not exceeding medium speed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed at not exceeding medium speed approaching next signal at not exceeding slow speed.

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching next signal at slow speed. Train or engine exceeding medium speed when indication is seen must take action at once to reduce to medium speed or slower, if necessary.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at next signal. Train or engine exceeding medium speed when indication is seen must take action at once to reduce to medium speed or slower, if necessary.

aspect.name: Medium Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed at not exceeding medium speed prepared to stop at next signal.

aspect.name: Slow Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Slow speed through crossovers, turnouts, sidings, interlocking limits, and over power switches. Train or engine may then proceed at maximum authorized speed, if conditions permit, but must approach the next signal at not exceeding slow speed.

aspect.name: Slow Approach
aspect.indication: Slow speedthrough crossovers, turnouts, sidings, interlocking limits, and over power switches; then proceed at not exceeding medium speed prepared to stop at the next signal.

aspect.name: Stop and Proceed
aspect.indication: Stop; then proceed at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Stop and Proceed Medium
aspect.indication: Stop; then proceed at restricted speed on medium speed route.
aspect.comment: Unofficial Rule and Aspect Name to allow for optional appearance. Only example I have seen of this aspect was on the Ohio River Subdivsion in a non CTC area. The only other aspect available on the mast was Restricting.
